verses.text: Ach in Diosal, sval wach' lolonel t'ayach, manh ach b'at mican t'a in lesal.
Yujto a eb' sk'ulan chucal yet' eb' tz'ak'an musansatil anima, chuc syal eb' t'a in patic. Esnhej tas syal eb' chi' t'a in patic.
Ha schichonk'olal eb' ste oymaj t'a in patic. Tz'och chi'an sk'ol eb' t'ayin, palta malaj in mul t'a eb'.
Ha spac in wach'k'olal t'a eb', to tz'och eb' ajk'olal t'ayin. Ha inxo jun, van in lesalvi yuj eb'.
Ha in wach' pensaril t'a eb', chuc syutej eb' spactzitan t'ayin. Axo spac in wach'k'olal t'a eb', to schichon sk'ol eb' t'ayin.
Ha junok vinh chuc spensar tzak'och juezal t'a yib'anh vinh. Aocab' junok yajk'ool vinh tz'ak'ancanb'at t'a yib'anh.
Ayic sch'olb'itaj vinh, alchajocab'i to ay smul vinh. Ochocab' pax slesal vinh smuloc.
Tzapanocab' tzutej sq'uinal vinh. Ch'ococab' pax mach tz'ochcan t'a yopisio vinh.
Meb'a' uninocab' tz'ajkan eb' yuninal vinh. Axo ix yetb'eyum vinh, canocab' ix t'a manh etb'eyumal.
Ek'ocab' eb' yuninal vinh sk'an wa sb'ha t'a titac pat. Pechchajocab'el eb' b'aj ek'nac spat.
Ik'chajocab' ek' masanil tastac ay t'a eb' yuj vinh tz'ak'an tumin majanil. Ik'chajocab'b'at smunlajel vinh yuj eb' ch'oc animail.
Malajocab' mach tz'ok' sk'ool t'a vinh. Malajocab' pax mach tz'ok' sk'ol t'a eb' yuninal vinh meb'haxo.
Satocab'el yinhtilal vinh, satocab'el sb'i vinh t'a junelnhej.
Mamin Jehová, nacot smul eb' smam yicham vinh. Mocab' a suc sat smul snun vinh.
Naanocab' smul eb' uuj. Mocxob' nachajcot eb' t'a sat lu'um tik.
Yujto manh naanoc yak'an wach'k'olal vinh. Palta to ix och vinh ajk'olal t'a eb' meb'a', t'a eb' anima emnaquil yeq'ui yet' t'a eb' ayoch t'a ilk'olal, masanto smilcham eb' vinh.
Scatab'ej anima vinh, cotocab' catab' t'a yib'anh vinh. Malajocab' b'ak'uinh scha wach'k'olal vinh yujto maj yak'laj svach'k'olal vinh t'a eb' anima chi'.
Axonhej catab' syal vinh, ichato a catab' chi' spichul vinh yaji. Ha catab' chi', icha ha' siquil ha' scuq'uej, ma icha aceite sco suquek' t'ayonh, icha chi' yaj t'a vinh.
Cotocab' yaelal t'a yib'anh snivanil vinh yuj scatab'an eb' anima chi', icha smuschaj co nivanil yet' co pichul. Ochocab'kan sut'an yaelal chi' t'a vinh t'a masanil tiempo icha junok tzek'ul.
Mamin Jehová, ichaocab' tik tzutej eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, aton eb' tz'alan in pecal.
Ha achxo pax ach Jehová Vajalil, ak'cot a wach'k'olal t'a vib'anh yic ol ach ik'jocchaanh. Yuj a wach'k'olal t'ayin, colineli.
Te meb'a' in, manhxo animaoc ved'nac svutej vab'ani, icha val to lajvinac in svab'i.
Van in satel icha junok enhul. Van vik'jib'at yuj ik' ichoc nok' k'ulub'.
Van yib'xi sjolom in penec, manhxalaj vip yujto maxtzac in valaj. Van in b'acb'i.
Tzeb'ajtac vilji t'a eb' anima. Ayic tzin yilan eb', sb'uchvaj eb' t'ayin.
Mamin Jehová, ochanh ved'oc. Ach in Diosal, colinel yuj a wach'k'olal.
Mamin Jehová, yojtaquejocab'el eb' anima to a ach ix in utej icha tik.
Malaj yelk'och in scatab'an eb' tato a ach tzak'cot a wach'k'olal t'ayin. Q'uixvocab' eb' yacb'an van stzalaj in k'ol a in a checab' in tik.
Ha eb' tz'alan in pecal, chamocab' eb' yuj q'uixvelal. Toxonhejocab' sat sk'ol eb' yuj q'uixvelal.
Mamin Jehová, ol vak' yuj diosal t'ayach t'a masanil tiempo. D'a skal tzijtumal anima ol val wach' lolonel t'ayach ach in Diosal,
yujto Yalumal eb' meb'a' aji. Ha ach tza colel eb' t'a yol sk'ab' eb' sgana yak'anoch chamel t'a yib'anh eb'.
